======Locks hardcore FF on server.======
= Description =

Locks the 'hardcore FF' mode, player can't off the 'hardcore FF' mode if enabled

=====Important Note:=====

* Locks hardcore FF function as same as plugin 'asw-exec-skills.smx', NO this plugin in your server if enabled, otherwise, your server has hardcore FF problem
